page.title: 13A WORKER AT GROVE FARM
page.content: There are two farm workers at Grovebury Farm and a days work is very hard for them. The farm worker has to get up at 6.00 am and starts work at 7.00 am. He mainly has to work from 8 to 12 hours a day. Maybe longer in the summer. One worker concentrates on maintenance, looking after the machinery and driving the tractors. The machinery they have got to help them do the work are, a combine harvester which is the largest,a chain saw, a corn drill and a deisel engine. The machinery is very noisy and not very comfortable.
